title: Activision Blizzard 's net income/loss from 2005 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Net income in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Net income in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Net income in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2016, and lastly roughly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 1813.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 45.0 was reported at Year 2005

The line drastically increased by 3.1 times from Year 2005 to 2006,increased by 3.7 times from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 2.6 times from Year 2010 to 2011,decreased by 3.5 times from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, increased by 6.6 times from Year 2017 to 2018.
